content: the cozy country lane crocheted afghan 1 will be sure to keep you warm even in the coldest new england winter while the colors and stitch pattern remind you of warm woodland summers finished measurement 42 wide x 52 long materials 3 skeins each of valley yarns northampton 2 colors fawn chocolate gold heather lt green heather merlot heather raspberry heather size h crochet hook gauge approx 14 sts = 4 in pattern st 1 http //www yarn com/product/webs-crochet-patterns-valley-yarns-179-country-lane-crocheted-afghan/ utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern-page&utm_campaign=valley-yarns-179 2 http //www yarn com/product/webs-knitting-yarns-valley-yarns-northampton/ utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=yarn-page&utm_campaign=valley-yarns-northampton
